SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllerInterface, OnServerConnectionLostListener
public class Controller extends Object implements OnServerConnectionLostListener, ControllerInterface
The Controller class manages the game logic and interactions between the model and the view. It implements the ControllerInterface and OnServerConnectionLostListener interfaces. The controller is responsible for handling player actions, managing the game state, and coordinating communication between the model and the view.
Since:
06/04/2023
Version:
3.0
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller(State state, LobbyController lobbyController, long delay, int numberOfPlayer) throws FileNotFoundException, URISyntaxException
      Constructs a Controller object with the given initial state and lobby controller. Initializes the game manager, chat manager, and timing state machine. Sets the current player change listener to the timing state machine.
      Parameters:
      state - the initial game state
      lobbyController - the lobby controller for managing the players
      delay - turn duration
      numberOfPlayer - number of players in the game
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if a file is not found during initialization
      URISyntaxException
      See Also:
      • State
      • LobbyController
      • GameManager
      • ChatManager
      • TimingStateMachine

    • dragTilesToBookShelf

      public void dragTilesToBookShelf(ClientInterface view, List<Coordinate> chosenTiles, int chosenColumn)
      Handles the drag action of tiles from the board to the player's bookshelf.
      Specified by:
      dragTilesToBookShelf in interface ControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      view - The client interface of the player.
      chosenTiles - The list of coordinates of chosen tiles to be dragged.
      chosenColumn - The column of the bookshelf where the tiles are dragged to.
      See Also:
